title: JAM Session 261 A Paperless Admissions Office It Is Possible (2).pdf
docSource: pdf file uploaded by the user.
pageContent: © 2015 Jenzabar, Inc. Presented by Krista Murray Hesston College May 27, 2015 A paperless Admissions office – it IS possible! Jenzabar’s Annual Meeting May 27 - 30, 2015 Gaylord Opryland Resort & Convention Center Nashville, TN © 2015 Jenzabar, Inc. Today’s session:  Motivation for going paperless  Resources needed  The process  What documents we scan and save  Steps in the process  Permissions  Ways we are using this across campus  Questions? © 2015 Jenzabar, Inc.  Savings – time and money  No more file cabinets and moving files each year  Easy access for All via notepad/or thru JICS with an internet connection – Admissions counselors, Registrar personnel, Advisors  Help to create a data driven culture Why? © 2015 Jenzabar, Inc.  Scanner – we use our copier/printer.  Ability to print/save to pdf file (MS Office, Chrome)  Second monitor for data entry personnel (Not a necessity - but almost!)  Shredder  Notepad user permissions for those that do have EX  JICS access for roles that don’t have EX  Minimal costs incurred (Scanner, Monitor) Resources © 2015 Jenzabar, Inc.  Basically any paper document we kept in the folder we now scan and save electronically: applications for admission, transcripts, references, etc.  Also documents we receive electronically now: internet submissions – apps and inquiry forms, electronic transcripts, etc. are saved The process © 2015 Jenzabar, Inc.  Documents are saved to a network folder – backed up 2x daily, access by permissions  Organization/Naming convention The process © 2015 Jenzabar, Inc. © 2015 Jenzabar, Inc. © 2015 Jenzabar, Inc.  Process: Scan documents in scanner (which is set up to scan to a network drive), or save to folder  Internet Submissions  Scanned documents  Link file to Notepad action © 2015 Jenzabar, Inc. © 2015 Jenzabar, Inc. © 2015 Jenzabar, Inc.  >>>more photos of process © 2015 Jenzabar, Inc. © 2015 Jenzabar, Inc. © 2015 Jenzabar, Inc.  JICS access for those who don’t have EX  We use Simple Query to limit access to necessary documents for various users/roles thru JICS access permissions  Example 1 - ACA committee © 2015 Jenzabar, Inc. Example 1 – ACA Review Committee © 2015 Jenzabar, Inc. © 2015 Jenzabar, Inc. © 2015 Jenzabar, Inc. Student Name, address, email © 2015 Jenzabar, Inc. © 2015 Jenzabar, Inc. © 2015 Jenzabar, Inc. Example 2 - Advisors © 2015 Jenzabar, Inc. © 2015 Jenzabar, Inc. Other ways we are going paperless and using notepad for documents:  Employment application for campus jobs  Financial Aid award, payment plan ( Friday, 1:30pm - 199 Capturing Financial Aid Awards & Payment Plans Online )  Registrar’s office – evaluating College transcripts  Student Life Health form Other applications © 2015 Jenzabar, Inc. Questions? © 2015 Jenzabar, Inc. Simple Query – for Advisor screen: SELECT n.ID_NUM , n.HC_PFName +' '+ n.LAST_NAME AS [Name], ''+RTRIM(CONVERT( varchar (255),F.ITEM_DESCRIPTION)) +'' AS [Document] FROM HC_ITEMS_Files F join ADVISOR_STUD_TABLE S ON F.id_number = s.ID_NUM join HC_Name_Format_view n ON F.id_number = n.ID_NUM where s.ADVISOR_TABLE_STS = 'A' AND F.Action_Code IN ('AACPT','ANURAC','OTHER','TRNSC','TRNSI','TRNSF','REF') AND s.ADVISOR_ID = @@ HostID © 2015 Jenzabar, Inc. Simple Query – Nursing dept review: SELECT n.ID_NUM , n.HC_PFName +' '+ n.LAST_NAME AS [Name], ''+RTRIM(CONVERT( varchar (255),F.ITEM_DESCRIPTION))+'' AS [Document] FROM HC_ITEMS_Files F join Candidacy C ON C.id_num = F.id_number join HC_Name_Format_view n ON F.id_number = n.ID_NUM where F.Action_Code IN ('AACPT','ANURAC','OTHER','TRNSC','TRNSI','TRNSF','REF','AACPT','ANURAC','A NURWL') AND C.yr_cde >= (select cur_yr_dflt from reg_config ) and c.CUR_CANDIDACY = 'Y' AND C.prog_cde like 'NUR%' Simple query example © 2015 Jenzabar, Inc. ALTER VIEW [ dbo ].[ HC_ITEMS_Files ] AS SELECT REPLACE(REPLACE(LINK_TO_FILE, ' \ ', '/'), 'G:/data/', ' https://my.hesston.edu/ ReportData / ') AS FileURL , ID_NUMBER, GROUP_NUMBER, SUBGROUP_NUMBER, GROUP_SEQUENCE, EVENT_CODE, EVENT_SCHEDULE_SEQ, ACTION_CODE, ACTION_LIST_CODE, ACTION_LIST_SEQ, ITEM_TYPE, ITEM_DESCRIPTION, START_DATE, END_DATE, START_TIME, END_TIME, TO_DO_ID_NUMBER, LOCATION_CODE, BUILDING_CODE, ROOM_CODE, SHELL_DOCUMENT, SHELL_PATH, LETTER_STYLE, LETTER_CDE, MERGED_DOCUMENT, MERGED_PATH, ACTIVE_INACTIVE, COMPLETION_CODE, NUMBER_CONFIRMED, TOTAL_FEES, ITEM_DATE, ITEM_TIME, OBJECT_KEY, MODULE_CODE, TO_DO_USER_ID, DISPLAY_ON_WEB, COMPLETION_DTE, LINK_TO_FILE, UDEF_1A_1, UDEF_1A_2, UDEF_1A_3, UDEF_1A_4, UDEF_1A_5, UDEF_2A_1, UDEF_2A_2, UDEF_2A_3, UDEF_3A_1, UDEF_3A_2, UDEF_3A_3, UDEF_DTE_1, UDEF_DTE_2, UDEF_3_2_1, UDEF_3_2_2, UDEF_5_2_1, UDEF_5_2_2, UDEF_5_2_3, UDEF_10A_1, USER_NAME, JOB_NAME, JOB_TIME FROM dbo.ITEMS AS I WHERE (LINK_TO_FILE IS NOT NULL) Sample View Table
